profile:
We service Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Newmarket, Bradford, Aurora, North York, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Courtice, Mississauga, Etobicoke and Brampton.

Locally owned, we specialize in all major and minor home repairs. Our uniformed techs are bonded, fully insured and our work is guaranteed. Let us help with that growing "to do" list. Call today!

Handyman Services, Bathroom & Kitchen - Fixtures and Accessories, Fences & Gates, Gutters and Eaves-troughs, Moldings / Moudings, Dry Wall Contractors, Tile and Grout Cleaning, Windows & Doors, Paint & Wallpaper Contractors.

profile:
Welcome to Rosales W&D, the purpose of this site is to assist You with finding the perfect product to Affordably Personalize your home.  With over 10 years experience, we can say that we have mastered our craft.  Our products are showcased around the City in residential homes and private estates.  Every year, thousands of clients choose us for their projects mainly because of our professionalism, attention to detail and our one of a kind buying experience which ensures customer satisfaction every time!  And if you're here, it's because you have not yet found what you're looking for.  We believe it's not enough to simply meet your expectations-we must exceed them.

*****
 
We take great pride in our wide variety of Products & Services such as Window Glass Replacements, Glass Shower Enclosures & Partitions, Mirrors, Glass Railings,
Wrought Iron Inserts, Decorative Glass Inserts, Door Systems etc.

*****
Rosales W&D has been servicing Toronto and the surrounding areas for many years.

*****

Rosales W&D
Delivering Quality to Your Home
 
rosaleswd@gmail.com
(416) 456-0937 / (416) 220-1484

profile:
Home maintenance service when you need it. 

Our mission is to help you with projects around your home.

You can rest easy knowing your home repair job is in experienced hands. We're not just proud of our workmanship we guarantee it.

We specializes in small to medium home improvements, repairs jobs. From paint to faucets. We get the things you want done Completed!

Our Standards

You'll notice the difference from the first time you call. You'll always talk to Me John the owner - a friendly tradesman who is ready to answer your questions and schedule your estimate.

When your job is finished, I will follow up to make sure you're happy with the work.

Looking forward to serving you!

We're social here:
https://www.instagram.com/the_handyman_services1/

We're also Baeumler approved:
https://www.baeumlerapproved.ca/contractors/the-handyman-services/

profile: Grand Merit Construction provides renovation and handyman services. Working with a trusted team, we keep us accountable throughout the entire work. We keep an eye on workmanship, budget and schedule to ensure that we deliver a quality work at the lowest costs on time. We offer a unique client experience that includes constant communication with you through the entire work. We will work closely with you to make sure that you are completely satisfied. We are licensed and fully insured (General Liability Insurance and WSIB). We have years of experience and we have pre-employment screening. We use the best tools to get your work done right. If you have any questions regarding any of our services, please visit us at www.grandmerit.ca, give us a call on +1 (647) 556-5100 or email us at info@grandmerit.ca

For all Home Owners and Property Investors we provide Maintainance, Repair and Construction related services.

profile:
We are a local, family-run business, serving the GTA Area. We have service technicians that reside in several communities throughout the GTA Area, so we are never far from you.

Our company provides a wide range of repair, maintenance, and improvement services; for both residential and commercial locations. We do jobs both big and small: from a one hour quick fix, up to full remodels.

We pride ourselves in the relationships that we establish with our clients. Our clients are satisfied with our work because we always exceed their expectations.

profile:
Whether you are undertaking a small home renovation or are in the planning phases of large-scale commercial development, Wolfsview Construction Inc. is here to better serve you.  We combine design to build and trades expertise, to excel at every stage of your project. 

Our qualified team of professionals is knowledgeable in all areas of construction – residential, commercial, corporate and industrial. We ensure that our projects are handled by the most qualified professionals, to suit the specific needs of our clients. As a trusted General Contractor,  we maintain responsibility for the day-to-day oversight of the construction site, from start to finish.  Our administrative staff liaises in an organized fashion at the earliest phases of project management in order to connect you with skilled tradespeople you can rely on, to ensure optimal safety in the workplace and to guarantee satisfaction upon project completion.

We take pride in working cohesively with you throughout the course of a project, so that the client can step back and watch a renovation come together, stress-free! 

When clients put their trust in us,  we have one specific goal in mind: to provide cost-effective, labor-efficient construction solutions, with environmental and work safety obligations as the pillars of our day to day operations.
project_minimum: No job is too small or big

profile:
We are a home renovation, remodel, and handyman services company. 

With over a decade of experience, we offer quality workmanship and attention to detail that fits any budget. We pride ourselves on attention to detail and customization of work for each project we undertake. Whether your project is indoors, outdoors, a small fix or a large-scale renovation, we are able to meet your need. 

BATHROOMS
Whether you are looking for luxury finishes or something simple and functional, we've got you covered. 

FLOORING
Vinyl and laminate floors are on the rise, as they are durable, versatile, and come in a variety of attractive colours, shades and textures. We also install hardwood floors and tiles.

DECKS
Have us build you a new deck or simply refurbish your existing deck.

OUTDOOR WORK
Let us revitalize your outdoor space! Whether its a new shed, a rock garden, pavers, stone features, or mulch and sod installation, we've got you covered. 

STORAGE SOLUTIONS
We'll help you create more storage space so you can better utilize your cold room/cantina, basement, garage, and shed. We can also convert your extra bedroom into a large walk-in closet. 

GENERAL HANDYMAN REPAIRS & MAINTENANCE
Drywall repairs, painting, staining, electrical fixture replacements, trim carpentry installations, and other home repair needs.
